Drug_working: Bilypsa Tablet contains Saroglitazar, a dual action peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor (PPAR) inhibitor that aids in the management of high cholesterol, especially triglycerides, as well as blood sugar levels in people with type 2 diabetes. It acts by a unique mechanism in which it reduces the synthesis and secretion of triglycerides (a type of lipid or cholesterol in blood). It also improves insulin sensitivity of the body for better utilization of the existing insulin and hence lowers the blood sugar levels.
Expert_advice: It is better to take Bilypsa Tablet after a meal or with a snack to avoid stomach problems.

Drug_working: Prolonged B12 deficiency can lead to nerve degeneration and irreversible neurological damage. B 29 Gold AQ Injection is a multivitamin product containing methylcobalamin, nicotinamide, and pyridoxine hydrochloride. Methylcobalamin corrects vitamin B12 deficiency, thereby helping in treating certain anemias and nerve problems. Nicotinamide (vitamin B3) exhibits neuroprotective properties, reduces cholesterol levels and other fatty substances in the blood, and increases good cholesterol. Pyridoxine hydrochloride treats and prevents the deficiency of vitamin B6 and improves the functioning of the nervous and immune systems.
Expert_advice: Inform your doctor if you are taking any other pain-relieving medicines before taking B 29 Gold AQ Injection.
B 29 Gold AQ Injection might cause dizziness and sleepiness; do not drive or use tools or machines after taking this medicine.
Inform your doctor if you have a history of seizures.
Along with B 29 Gold AQ Injection, your doctor might also advise you to undergo physiotherapy to relieve pain.

uses: Treatment of Diabetic gastroparesis (diabetic nerve disease affecting stomach)
Drug_working: Bevoprox 12.5mg Injection is an atypical antipsychotic. It works by increasing the release of acetylcholine (a chemical messenger). This increases the movement of stomach and intestines, and prevents reflux (acid going up to the food pipe) as well as nausea or vomiting. Since it modulates the motor function of the gastrointestinal tract, it also improves delayed gastric emptying.
Expert_advice: Let your doctor know if you have a history of seizures or unusual muscle movements, as Bevoprox 12.5mg Injection can sometimes affect the nervous system and trigger them.
After getting this medicine, avoid standing up too quickly to prevent sudden dizziness or feeling faint.
If you are diabetic, ask your doctor to keep an eye on your blood sugar. This medicine can sometimes affect it.
Keep track of how you feel after each dose. If your mood changes a lot or you feel too restless, share it with your doctor.

Drug_working: Amlokind 5 Tablet is a calcium channel blocker. In high blood pressure, it normalizes the blood pressure by relaxing the blood vessels to reduce the pressure on them, thereby improving the blood flow in the body. In heart-related chest pain (angina), the enhanced blood flow in the body relaxes the heart muscles by reducing the workload on the heart. It also improves the oxygen flow in the body, thereby,  preventing any heart-related chest pain.
Expert_advice: You have been prescribed Amlokind 5 Tablet to improve your blood pressure and/or to reduce the number and severity of angina attacks.
Lowering blood pressure reduces the chance of future heart attack and stroke.

It can cause ankle or foot swelling. To reduce the swelling, raise your legs while you are sitting down. Talk to your doctor if it does not go away.

Drug_working: Atorva 40 Tablet is a lipid-lowering medication (statin). It works by blocking an enzyme (HMG-CoA-reductase) that is required in the body to make cholesterol. It thus lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides, raising the level of "good" cholesterol (HDL).
Expert_advice: Atorva 40 Tablet may cause diarrhea, gas, or an upset stomach. If any of these happen to you, please consult with your doctor.

Your doctor may check your liver function before starting the treatment and regularly thereafter. Inform your doctor if you notice signs of liver problems, such as stomach pains, unusually dark urine, or yellowing of skin or eyes.

Inform your doctor if you have kidney disease, liver disease, or diabetes before starting treatment with this medicine. If you are diabetic, monitor your blood sugar level regularly, as Atorva 40 Tablet may cause an increase in your blood sugar level.
Do not take Atorva 40 Tablet if you are pregnant, planning a pregnancy, or breastfeeding.
Atorva 40 Tablet treats high cholesterol by lowering "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats). It should be taken in addition to regular exercise and a low-fat diet.

product_name: Aroraft Oral Suspension Mint Sugar Free
salt_composition: Calcium Carbonate (80mg) + Sodium Alginate (250mg) + Sodium Bicarbonate (133.5mg)
Drug_working: Aroraft Oral Suspension Mint Sugar Free is a combination of three medications: Calcium carbonate, sodium alginate, and sodium bicarbonate. Calcium carbonate and sodium bicarbonate react with stomach acid, releasing bubbles of carbon dioxide. These bubbles allow the gel to form a strong protective barrier on top of the stomach contents, thereby preventing stomach acid from flowing back into the esophagus. Additionally, sodium bicarbonate dissolves quickly and neutralizes the stomach acid, exerting a rapid buffering action. Sodium alginate reacts with gastric acid present in the stomach and produces a low-density viscous gel that floats on top of the stomach. This forms a physical barrier that protects the esophageal mucosa and the airways from the gastric reflux. Alginate has a rapid onset, providing quick relief from reflux symptoms. Additionally, it has a prolonged duration of action, providing relief for up to 4 hours.
Substitute_medicine: Insta Raft Oral Suspension Mint Sugar Free
MacRaft Oral Suspension Mint Sugar Free

GaviRaft Oral Suspension Soothing Mint Sugar Free
Ulpan RFT Oral Suspension Mint Sugar Free
Expert_advice: Avoid taking Aroraft Oral Suspension Mint Sugar Free at the same time as you take other medicine. This is because antacids can affect how well other medicine is absorbed.

Drug_working: Amlogard 5mg Tablet is a calcium channel blocker. In high blood pressure, it normalizes the blood pressure by relaxing the blood vessels to reduce the pressure on them, thereby improving the blood flow in the body. In heart-related chest pain (angina), the enhanced blood flow in the body relaxes the heart muscles by reducing the workload on the heart. It also improves the oxygen flow in the body, thereby,  preventing any heart-related chest pain.
Expert_advice: You have been prescribed Amlogard 5mg Tablet to improve your blood pressure and/or to reduce the number and severity of angina attacks.
Lowering blood pressure reduces the chance of future heart attack and stroke.

Drug_working: Angiwell 2.6mg Tablet is a nitrate. It works by relaxing the blood vessels and increasing the supply of blood and oxygen to the heart while reducing its work load, thereby preventing/treating attacks of angina (chest pain).
Expert_advice: Angiwell 2.6mg Tablet may cause dizziness or sleepiness. Do not drive or do anything that requires concentration until you know how it affects you.
Do not consume alcohol while taking Angiwell 2.6mg Tablet as it may cause increased dizziness.
It may cause headaches which usually go away after a few days of continued treatment. Inform your doctor if it persists.
You may develop tolerance to Angiwell 2.6mg Tablet with time, meaning that the same dose may be less effective next time. Follow the prescribed dosing schedule to avoid this.

Drug_working: Aztogold 20 Capsule is a combination of three medicines: aspirin, atorvastatin, and clopidogrel. Aspirin and clopidogrel are antiplatelet medications. They work by preventing the platelets from sticking together and decreasing the formation of harmful blood clots. Atorvastatin is a lipid-lowering medication that blocks an enzyme required in the body to make cholesterol. It lowers the "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides and raises the "good" cholesterol (HDL).
Expert_advice: Aztogold 20 Capsule increases your risk of bleeding. Be careful while shaving, cutting fingernails or toenails, or using sharp objects.
Notify your doctor if you experience unusual fatigue, loss of appetite, or yellowing of your eyes or skin.
Notify your doctor if you experience muscle symptoms (pain or weakness), particularly if you have a fever, a sick feeling, or dark urine.
Let your doctor know you are taking Aztogold 20 Capsule before undergoing any surgical procedure.
Let your doctor know if you are pregnant or planning for pregnancy.
